name: Dream Catcher
description:
A lonely guy meets a lot of strange girls in his dream.
Let's solve the puzzle to see the girls more clearly.
DreamCatcher is a strategy game. What you need to do is mark the heart in front and the reward for you is the beautiful girl behind.
Features
It’s a casual hearts weeper with a lot of beautiful girls.
Solve the puzzle and get the full picture of the girl.
Soothing music.
Victory conditions
You need to mark all hearts. If you make too many mistakes, you have to start over, so this game also needs a little luck.
How to play
Left click to open the grid, right click to mark heart. You have a number in the grid, it means there are a number of hearts around this grid.
